title: Ambient Mesh: Can Sidecar-less Istio Make Applications Faster?
author: Lin Sun
description: Explore how Fortio integrates with Istio for efficient performance testing and monitoring in a microservices architecture using the Bookinfo app and popular DevOps tools like Kubernetes, Prometheus, and Grafana.
cntitle: 环境网格：无边车 Istio 能否让应用程序更快？
cndescription: 探索 Fortio 如何与 Istio 集成，使用 Bookinfo 应用和流行的 DevOps 工具（如 Kubernetes、Prometheus 和 Grafana）在微服务架构中进行高效的性能测试和监控。
